[[Michael Tribbiani]] (nephew) |relationships = Walter (fiancé)}} '''Mary-Therese Tribbiani''' is one of [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]'s sisters. == On Friends == [[Image:MaryTherese.jpg|left|thumb|140px|Mary-Therese]] She has feelings for Chandler after [[The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister|Joey's birthday party]] and kisses him at a dinner at her parents' house. Chandler thinks she is Mary-Angela, and rejects her. Mary-Angela enters almost immediately after he asks Mary-Therese which one Mary-Angela is. == On Joey == In ''[[Joey (TV Series)|Joey]]'', Mary-Therese has been renamed '''Mary-Theresa''' and has virtually no similarities to the Mary-Therese in ''Friends''. She is Joey's second youngest sister and extremely spoiled. She is seen in only one episode, [[Joey and the Fancy Sister]].
